software.name: elog
software.custom_start_script:
PID_FILE=/tmp/pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
/home/local/sbin/elogd -c /usr/local/elog/elogd.cfg -f /tmp/pid -d /home/fs/logbooks -v 2 &

touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
echo $pid >/tmp/pid
wait
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete

exit
software.custom_install_script:
cd /home/app/src
echo "Building"
env ROOT=/home/app PREFIX=/../local HAVE_SSL=0 make  >& /tmp/err
if test $? -ne 0
   then 
     tail -40 /tmp/err
     echo "Build Failed"
     exit
  else
    echo Build Sucessful
 fi

echo "Installing"

env ROOT=/home/app PREFIX=/../local HAVE_SSL=0 make install >& /tmp/err
if test $? -ne 0
   then 
     tail -40 /tmp/err
     echo "Install Failed"
  else
    echo Install Sucessful
 fi
